A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
There is so much unjustified hate for this film. Some of the simpler fans can't handle the fresh new direction Johnston has taken. Don't forget that J J Abrams was the executive producer for TLJ\, so anybody who said that Johnston "ruined" what J J set up are woefully uninformed. 
TLJ is an amazing film that nobody could have predicted. Perfectly cast\, amazing action\, juicy plot.
The Skywalkers had their era. These are new films with a new generation of characters to assume the mantle. People need to let go of the past heros and move on!
Will definitely watch again and again!
